meanings.definition: A person or thing that exceeds.
meanings.sent1: The team's top scorer was one of the exceeders in the match.
meanings.sent2: The exceeders in the competition were awarded special prizes.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel became an exceeder when it gathered more nuts than its friends.
meanings.sent4: The sun, an exceeder of light, brightened up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The superhero was known as the ultimate exceeder of evil in the city.

meanings.definition: A verb form meaning to surpass or go beyond a certain limit.
meanings.sent1: The coach encouraged the team to be exceeders in their performance.
meanings.sent2: The exceeders of expectations were praised for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The cake batter seemed to be an exceeder, rising higher than expected in the oven.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was an exceeder, filling the room with joy and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The river, an exceeder of its banks, flooded the nearby fields.
